title: There really needs to be a lobby report feature
body:
So basically I was doing a ranked game, and my support (I was ad) was going to play lux, which I have nothing against (I prefer champions that are made for support, but lux works so I'm not complaining). Anyway, the other team picked lux, so my support locked karthus (someone who he has played twice, I think, based on his mastery) and said explicitly that he 'wouldn't support' and that he would just troll since they were on a 9 loss streak anyway. I dodged, because I'm not going to spend time trying to solo lane while karthus ints. Since I dodged, and this was in my promos, I **have** to win my next game to go up. Is there anything that I could have done in this instance, except wait for riot to implement an in-lobby report feature?
Thanks
